title: Nemty Decryptor Guide
plain_text:
# Nemty Decryptor Guide


-----

## Table of Contents

**1.** **HOW TO START...................................................................................................................... 3**

1.1. DOWNLOAD THE NEMTY DECRYPTOR ................................................................................................ 3
1.2. EXECUTE THE DECRYPTOR ................................................................................................................ 3
1.3. ACCEPT WARNING .......................................................................................................................... 3
1.4. ACCEPT END-USER LICENSE AGREEMENT ........................................................................................... 4

**2.** **USING NEMTY DECRYPTOR .................................................................................................... 5**

2.1. START........................................................................................................................................... 6
2.2. UPLOAD THE RANSOM NOTE ............................................................................................................ 7
2.3. OPTIONAL: UPLOAD AN ENCRYPTED FILE ............................................................................................ 9
2.4. SELECT PATH TO DECRYPT .............................................................................................................. 10

Nemty Decryptor Guide 2/11


-----

## 1. How to start

#### 1.1. Download the Nemty Decryptor
Go to nomoreransom.org and download the executable.

#### 1.2. Execute the decryptor
Go to your “Downloads” folder and double-click on NemtyDecryptor.exe

#### 1.3. Accept warning
Press the button ‘Run’ in the warning.

Nemty Decryptor Guide 3/11


-----

#### 1.4. Accept End-User License Agreement
To accept the End-User License Agreement, click on the button “Accept the EULA”.

Nemty Decryptor Guide 4/11


-----

## 2. Using Nemty Decryptor
Please read the instructions on the Usage tab, it explains what files you can upload.

Nemty Decryptor Guide 5/11


-----

#### 2.1. Start
In the left corner, go to the tab “Start”.

Nemty Decryptor Guide 6/11


-----

#### 2.2. Upload the Ransom note
Click on the button “Select File”.

There is a pop-up where you can browse for the note. As stated in ‘Usage’, this can be found in every
folder with encrypted files and looks like “NEMTY-DECRYPT.txt” or “_NEMTY_#######_DECRYPT.txt”.

Now press the ‘Send’ button.

Nemty Decryptor Guide 7/11


-----

You can see ‘Success’ in the left bottom corner when the note is sent.

Nemty Decryptor Guide 8/11


-----

#### 2.3. Optional: Upload an encrypted file
Either you are asked of an encrypted file, or you can go directly top paragraph 2.4 “Select path to
decrypt”.

- Click on the button ‘Select File’

There is a pop-up where you can browse for an encrypted file. Read the ‘Usage’ tab for a list of
supported file types.

- Press the ‘Send’ button

Nemty Decryptor Guide 9/11


-----

You can now see in the bottom left corner that the server is busy processing your request.

#### 2.4. Select path to decrypt
You can decrypt a specific path, including all subfolders. Select the path you want to decrypt.

The path you used for the ransom note is selected by default.

- Press the ‘Decrypt’ button

Nemty Decryptor Guide 10/11


-----

After the decryption has finished, a summary is displayed of files which were successfully decrypted
and of files which could not be decrypted.

Nemty Decryptor Guide 11/11


-----
